name: Beeswax
description: Natural wax that mildly reduces shrinkage in composite formulations. Often used as a primary base but also functions as a blend stabilizer.

name: Pine Rosin
description: Pine-derived resin providing strong adhesion, hardness, and tack. Essential for filament structural integrity.

name: Carnauba Wax
description: High-hardness plant wax used to significantly increase surface polish and rigidity.

name: Soy Wax
description: Semi-crystalline wax that gently increases viscosity and reduces shrinkage in blends.

name: Coconut Wax
description: Soft fatty wax providing gentle thickening and dimensional control.

name: Soy Lecithin
description: Phospholipid emulsifier that increases viscosity, enhances miscibility, and improves tack and adhesion.

name: Cork Flour
description: Lightweight elastic filler that enhances shock absorption, reduces hardness, and acts as thermal insulator.

name: Grog (1 um)
description: Ultra-fine ceramic grog for maximizing hardness, viscosity, and shrinkage reduction at low loadings.

name: Grog (3 um)
description: Fine ceramic filler improving mold rigidity, shrinkage control, and dimensional stability.

name: Grog (6 um)
description: Moderately fine grog balancing structural rigidity and flow resistance.

name: Kaolinite Clay
description: Mineral clay with fine platelets increasing hardness and flexural modulus. Mild thickener and stabilizing filler.

name: Calcium Bentonite Clay
description: Swelling clay providing thixotropy, shock absorption, and shrinkage reduction.

name: Calcium Alginate
description: Seaweed-derived ionic gel contributing to hardness and shock absorption.

name: Graphite Powder
description: Highly conductive carbon additive for improved heat distribution.

name: Diatomaceous Earth
description: Amorphous silica with high porosity and surface area for significant viscosity increase.

name: Attapulgite Clay
description: Fibrous clay adding thixotropy and particulate dispersion stability.

name: Stearin
description: Fatty acid ester stabilizer and viscosity modifier for flow control.

name: Glass Microfibers
description: High-modulus glass fiber for strong flexural stiffness increase. Reduces shock absorption.

name: Silica Flour
description: Fine inert powder flow modifier and anti-stick agent.

name: Chalk Powder
description: Calcium carbonate filler that reduces layer bonding for anti-adhesion control.

name: Illite Clay
description: Abundant clay offering moderate flexural stiffness reinforcement.

name: Copaiba Balsam
description: Viscous oleoresin adding impact resistance, elasticity, and tack.

name: Frankincense
description: Aromatic resin adding moderate resilience, elasticity, and soft stickiness.

name: Myrrh Oleoresin
description: Thick aromatic oleoresin improving adhesion, toughness, tack, and crack resistance.

name: Ginger Oleoresin
description: Warm spicy additive providing moderate tackiness and softening.

name: Benzoin Resin Extract
description: Sticky aromatic resin enhancing tack and interlayer bonding.

name: Copal Resin
description: Semi-hard resin improving surface bonding, hardness, and durability.

name: Carrageenan Resin
description: Seaweed-derived gelling agent enhancing surface wetting, tack, and adhesion.
